column3: Expected heterozygosity, commonly used for measuring within population genetic diversity.
Mean genetic distance between the given genetic sample and the other samples of the dataset. See Matrix of genetic distances for all the pairwise distances.
Mean of the genetic distance between the given genetic sample  and the other samples of the same geographic region. See Matrix of genetic distances for all the pairwise distances.
Distance of a population from Africa through a number of fixed waypoints so to approximate early human expansions. The waypoints are taken from Ramachandran et al. 2005 (see ref.)
